meanings.definition: Lacking texture or variation in surface quality.
meanings.sent1: The smooth, textureless fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The plain, textureless wall was painted in a single color.
meanings.sent3: The textureless cake was so bland, it tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as textureless as a flat, featureless landscape.
meanings.sent5: The textureless painting lacked any depth or interest.

meanings.sent1: The story was so textureless that it failed to capture my attention.
meanings.sent2: His explanation was so textureless that I couldn't understand the concept.
meanings.sent3: The textureless joke fell flat, leaving everyone silent.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt as textureless as a blank sheet of paper.
meanings.sent5: The textureless conversation left me feeling empty and bored.
